data.title: Who Is Blood Sisters Cast Gabriel Afolayan Wife Adebanke Afolayan? Meet the Couple On Instagram
data.meta_description: Gabriel Afolayan, better known by his stage name G-Fresh, is a Nigerian entertainer and artist born and brought up in the country. Afoloyan won the Best Supporting Actor grant for his depiction of Tavier Jambari in the film, Hoodrush (2012). He is most popular for his part in the dramatization series Blood Sisters (2003).
data.text:
Gabriel Afolayan, better known by his stage name G-Fresh, is a Nigerian entertainer and artist born and brought up in the country.

Afoloyan won the Best Supporting Actor grant for his depiction of Tavier Jambari in the film, Hoodrush (2012). He is most popular for his part in the dramatization series Blood Sisters (2003).

tvguidetime.com

Gabriel is likewise notable for his melodies Awelewa and Kokoro Ife.

He is cheerfully hitched to his significant other, Adebanke Afolayan. They had an immense embarrassment that nearly broke their marriage.

The Cast Of Blood Sisters Gabriel Afolayan Married Adebanke Afolayan Gabriel Afolayan, an honor winning entertainer, is right now hitched to Adebanke Afolayan, born in Osogbo, Osun State. She has finished her tertiary schooling and was an inhabitant of the United States of America, where she resided and worked prior to wedding the entertainer.

The pair had dated for oneself and a half years prior to being hitched. The couple led their wedding presentation service in Osogbo, Osun State, trailed by a conventional wedding in 2018.

At long last, they had their customary wedding on Thursday, April 5, 2018, at Ibadan Oyo State with their family, companions, and partners. Their marriage nearly came to a fall in 2020 while a duping talk surfaced.

In March, Gistlovers, a famous tattle site, guaranteed that Gabrielâs better half, Adebanke, was going behind his back with well known entertainer and artist Banky W.

According to the blog, Adebanke and Banky W had known one another before her union with Gabriel. Banky W had even gone to their wedding. The couple unfollowed each other on Instagram, suggesting that they had separated during the ruckus to add to the uproar.

Both the pair didnât address the discussion around then, not until following a year in 2021, Gabriel talked on the circumstance with City People Magazine.

The entertainer expressed that he was a private person who liked to determine the matter in private. He then said plainly that their marriage is flawless and that all issues among him and his better half have been settled.

Gabriel Afolayan Family And Ethnicity Adeyemi Afolayan, a notable Nigerian movie entertainer, chief, and maker, is the dad of Gabriel. Gabrielâs dad is additionally the brother of Toyin Afolayan, a notable entertainer.

Gabrielâs dad is otherwise called Ade Love. He unfortunately died in 1996. Notwithstanding, his momâs character is obscure.

Moji Afolayan, his sister, and his two brothers, Kunle Afolayan and Aremu Afolayan, will be Afolayanâs kin. His kin are on the whole makers or entertainers/entertainers in media outlets.

Total assets Of Gabriel Afolayan Gabrielâs total assets isnât known to the general population. Afolayan has north of thirty years of involvement with the media area. The cast of Blood Sisters has amassed a huge abundance through the profit of his occupation as an entertainer and vocalist.

He has a bustling timetable with new undertakings on the way. The honor winning entertainer has made a favorable luck as an entertainer, artist, and maker.
